attributes.action: Stop the party system of government and make all MP's independant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are supposed to represent the people of their constituency not the views of their party leader and faithfull. While the party system is in place there is no democracy in Britain. Make all MP's canvas locally, be funded locally and responsible to the their constituents. Abolish the party whip and have consensus government.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
